com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.provisioning

Class EpsConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.provisioning.EpsConfigurationBuilder

  • public class EpsConfigurationBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for provisioning configuration with EPS server
    Since:
    4.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • EpsConfigurationBuilder

        public EpsConfigurationBuilder(SecureString registrationCode,
                               java.net.URL url,
                               java.lang.String domain,
                               MobileProvisioningProtocol provisioningProtocol,
                               java.lang.String rsaKeyId,
                               java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey publicKey)
        Initialize builder with mandatory configurations. Use this API for Mobile Provisioning Protocol version 5
        Parameters:
        registrationCode - Minimum registration code length is 2, and maximun registration code length is 14.
        url - the URL of the Enrollment API endpoint (e.g. http(s)://:/EnrolmentServlet/GetAppCredentials for EPS 1.x, http(s)://:/provisioner/api/provisioning/pp for EPS 2.x or http(s)://:/provisioner/provision for EPS 3.x)
        domain - This domain can only be use when the provisioningProtocol set to MobileProvisioningProtocol.PROVISIONING_PROTOCOL_V5 and above as well as when EPS that is being use is version 3 and above. Otherwise, this domain can be put null or empty.
        provisioningProtocol - ProvisioningProtocol version
        rsaKeyId - RSA publicKey ID
        publicKey - RSA publicKey
        Since:
        5.0

      • EpsConfigurationBuilder

        public EpsConfigurationBuilder(SecureString registrationCode,
                               java.net.URL url,
                               java.lang.String domain,
                               MobileProvisioningProtocol provisioningProtocol,
                               java.lang.String rsaKeyId,
                               byte[] rsaExponent,
                               byte[] rsaModulus)
        Initialize builder with mandatory configurations. Use this API for Mobile Provisioning Protocol version 5
        Parameters:
        registrationCode - Minimum registration code length is 2, and maximun registration code length is 14.
        url - the URL of the Enrollment API endpoint (e.g. http(s)://:/EnrolmentServlet/GetAppCredentials for EPS 1.x, http(s)://:/provisioner/api/provisioning/pp for EPS 2.x or http(s)://:/provisioner/provision for EPS 3.x)
        domain - This domain can only be use when the provisioningProtocol set to MobileProvisioningProtocol.PROVISIONING_PROTOCOL_V5 and above as well as when EPS that is being use is version 3 and above. Otherwise, this domain can be put null or empty.
        provisioningProtocol - ProvisioningProtocol version
        rsaKeyId - RSA publicKey ID
        rsaExponent - RSA publicKey exponent
        rsaModulus - RSA publicKey modulus
        Since:
        5.0

      • EpsConfigurationBuilder

        public EpsConfigurationBuilder(SecureString registrationCode,
                               java.net.URL url,
                               MobileProvisioningProtocol provisioningProtocol,
                               java.lang.String rsaKeyId,
                               java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey publicKey)
        Initialize builder with mandatory configurations. This API does not support Mobile Provisioning Protocol version 5
        Parameters:
        registrationCode - Minimum registration code length is 2, and maximun registration code length is 14.
        url - the URL of the Enrollment API endpoint (e.g. http(s)://:/EnrolmentServlet/GetAppCredentials for EPS 1.x, http(s)://:/provisioner/api/provisioning/pp for EPS 2.x)
        provisioningProtocol - ProvisioningProtocol version
        rsaKeyId - RSA publicKey ID
        publicKey - RSA publicKey

      • EpsConfigurationBuilder

        public EpsConfigurationBuilder(SecureString registrationCode,
                               java.net.URL url,
                               MobileProvisioningProtocol provisioningProtocol,
                               java.lang.String rsaKeyId,
                               byte[] rsaExponent,
                               byte[] rsaModulus)
        Initialize builder with mandatory configurations. This API does not support Mobile Provisioning Protocol version 5
        Parameters:
        registrationCode - Minimum registration code length is 2, and maximun registration code length is 14.
        url - the URL of the Enrollment API endpoint (e.g. http(s)://:/EnrolmentServlet/GetAppCredentials for EPS 1.x, http(s)://:/provisioner/api/provisioning/pp for EPS 2.x)
        provisioningProtocol - ProvisioningProtocol version
        rsaKeyId - RSA publicKey ID
        rsaExponent - RSA publicKey exponent
        rsaModulus - RSA publicKey modulus

      • setTlsConfiguration

        public EpsConfigurationBuilder setTlsConfiguration(TlsConfiguration tlsConfig)
        Set TLS configuration. Default TlsConfiguration does not allow Self-signed certificates, Hostname mismatch or Insecure connection (HTTP)
        Parameters:
        tlsConfig - TlsConfiguration
        Returns:
        builder
